name: Fun Maths Game
description:
The goal is very simple, complete as many of the questions on screen before the timer runs out! Each level will lower the timer by a few seconds, with 2 seconds per question being the lowest.

Failing to answer the question correctly will result in losing a life. Make sure to not lose all 3 otherwise its game over!

This game was created for a school project intended to be ran on mobile. I enjoyed the concept so much I decided to expand upon it and upload a PC port.

Controls:

Use (alt+enter) to enable fullscreen

Use (alt+f4) to exit game
